text.text: See the **top devices** on which emails are opened

An integrated client management function that lets you perform variety of tasks with regard to create client groups, add client accounts, view and manage all of the existing accounts with ability to send them a broadcast. Collection of all functions to help you manage the client accounts.
Monitor the account activity by accessing the activity logs widget right on the dashboard. All the actions taken by all the users appear in the recent activities widget.
See the mapped out **Geo Location reporting**
Mumara displays an intuitive heat map on the dashboard showing the regions from where emails have been opened by the recipients.
Keep a track of all the email broadcasts that have been scheduled in recent times as Mumara displays the recent schedules on the dashboard.
